Comparison

Klaus Schliep

January 14, 2020

Source: vignettes/Comparison.Rmd
Comparison.Rmd

R Markdown

library(ape)
library(phyloregion)
library(betapart)
library(picante)
## Loading required package: vegan
## Loading required package: permute
## Loading required package: lattice
## This is vegan 2.5-6
## Loading required package: nlme
library(vegan)
library(microbenchmark)

data(africa)
X_Matrix <- africa$comm
tree <- africa$phylo
tree <- keep.tip(tree, colnames(X_Matrix))

X_matrix <- as.matrix(X_Matrix)
object.size(X_Matrix)
## 885952 bytes
object.size(X_matrix)
## 4216952 bytes
dim(X_Matrix)
## [1]  365 1393

Phylogenetic beta diversity

system.time(phylobeta_phyloregion <- phylobeta(X_Matrix, tree))
##    user  system elapsed 
##   0.137   0.016   0.154
system.time(phylobeta_betapart <- phylo.beta.pair(X_matrix, tree))
##    user  system elapsed 
## 782.246   1.005 783.381
system.time(phylobeta_picante <- phylosor(X_matrix, tree))
##    user  system elapsed 
## 754.958   0.392 755.885
